title: 14) Add Board
name: addBoard
description: add board to a specific vitabox if the requester is sponsor of it.

Parameter.description: place where the board is located, if wearable is null

title: 11) Add Patient
name: addPatient
description: add patient to a specific vitabox if the requester is sponsor of it.

title: 08) Add User
name: addUser
description: add user to a specific vitabox if the requester is sponsor of it.

title: 01) Create
name: create
description: create a new vitabox.

title: 07) Delete
name: delete
description: list all users related with the vitabox if the requester is related too.

title: 05) Find
name: find
description: find a specific vitabox if the requester is related to it.

Success 200.description: latitude of each vitabox, min: -90, max: 90 (based on google maps coordinates)
longitude of each vitabox, min: -180, max: 180 (based on google maps coordinates)
flag indicating if the requester is sponsor of that vitabox (only if NOT admin)
configuration's structure, defined by vitabox (only if admin)
flag indicating if the vitabox was already registered (only if admin)
flag indicating if the vitabox was already activated (only if admin)

title: 15) Get Boards
name: getBoards
description: get boards of specific vitabox if the requester is related to it.

Success 200.description: place where the board is located (house division)
model of each board, contains an id, type and name

title: 12) Get Patients
name: getPatients
description: get patients of specific vitabox if the requester is related to it.

title: 09) Get Users
name: getUsers
description: get users of specific vitabox if the requester is related to it.

Success 200.description: flag indicating if the user is sponsor of the vitabox

title: 04) List
name: list
description: list all vitaboxes related to the user.

Success 200.description: latitude of each vitabox, min: -90, max: 90 (based on google maps coordinates)
longitude of each vitabox, min: -180, max: 180 (based on google maps coordinates)
flag indicating if the requester is sponsor of that vitabox (only if NOT admin)
configuration's structure, defined by vitabox (only if admin)
flag indicating if the vitabox was already registered (only if admin)
flag indicating if the vitabox was already activated (only if admin)
